ibis.io

Class BufferedArrayInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • ibis.io.DataInputStream
        • ibis.io.BufferedArrayInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataInput, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public final class BufferedArrayInputStream
extends DataInputStream
    This is a complete implementation of DataInputStream. It is built on top of an InputStream. There is no need to put any buffering inbetween. This implementation does all the buffering needed.
